Comments.Message:
Hi,

Unfortunately, Codeplex does not allow a repository to support Mercurial AND SVN, you have to choose either one or the other. SVN is online only, so it's not good for me. As long as I won't be able to have both mercurial and SVN, I am afraid I cannot solve that issue.

Cheers,
